Title: Requires state agencies to publish certain information in local, community and ethnic media
Summary: Enacts the "local, community and ethnic media commitment act"; requires state agencies to publish certain information in local, community and ethnic media; defines local, community and ethnic media; requires the office of general services to develop and maintain a list of local, community and ethnic media outlets.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring state agencies to publish certain information in local, community and ethnic media
